programmes.show_description: The life and crimes of notorious criminal Kenneth Noye, and a heartbreaking murder that led to an international manhunt.

A visiting conman crashes his car, prompting him to confess to a life of crime. Carol Cassidy visits a terminally ill woman at home - but meets violent resistance.
A comet that emerges once every hundred years is set to make its appearance soon, and the whole town of Middleton is buzzing with excitement.

The remaining three designers create their own full collections to showcase their designs in a catwalk event; experts Car Deeley and Bella Freud judge.
Extreme angler Jeremy Wade investigates the stories behind supposedly deadly freshwater creatures.
Peter Andre's 60 Minute Makeover is back and bigger than ever on Quest Red. Peter and his army of helpers will be surprising deserving people across the country with a stunning home mkeover -
Nostalgic police drama. Mason thwarts a gang of robbers, but how far will the crooks go to finish the job? Dawn's birthday party goes off with an unexpected bang.
The unfiltered realities Irish people face in the search for a home, taking a look at the emotional rollercoaster, challenges and hard-won joys of buying a property.
Look who's coming to stay...Alex Polizzi continues her quest to turn badly run hotels into profitable ventures.
A warning at work for Jacob. Bear needs help. Arthur is panicked.
Bernie protests her innocence to the police; George's livelihood comes under serious threat; Bethany helps Shona to recapture the romance; Cassie plots a surprise for Steve.
Jeff Goodwin uncovers serious problems at a local residential home and things start to go off the rails - but how will this affect the doctors' big day?
Detective drama series. A couple threatened with violence unless they move out of their cottage are accused of murdering the landowner.
Detective drama series. Lane puts herself in jeopardy when she mishandles an informant, but can Wycliffe and Kersey find her in time?
A deceased woman's body is found on the moors shortly after a wounded, traumatised stranger arrives in Aidensfield, which leaves one resident in harm's way.
Drama series telling the story of Harry Selfridge, who arrives in London from Chicago in 1908 with a grand plan to open the finest department store in the world.
On Coronation Street in Weatherfield, England, working-class citizens attempt to make it through life, however drama continuously ensues.
